text: Jytte Abildstrøm (25 March 1934 – 2 January 2025) was a Danish actress, and theatre manager. She appeared in 40 movies between 1956 and 2006. She was born in Copenhagen, Denmark. She was known for her roles in Helle for Helene, Don Olsen kommer til byen and The Adventures of Picasso. Abildstrøm entered hospice care in December 2024. She died on 2 January 2025, two months shy of her 91st birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Danish movie actors Category:Danish television actors Category:Danish stage actors Category:Actors from Copenhagen
title: Jytte Abildstrøm
